endpoints.description: Retrieve the list of available energy commodities for trading.
Create a new trade transaction for a specific energy commodity.
Fetch details of a specific trade transaction by its ID.
Modify the details of an existing trade transaction.
Obtain the latest market prices for listed energy commodities.
Submit a request to analyze market price fluctuations for a specific commodity.
Retrieve analytics and insights based on active trade data.
View the trading history for a specific producer or consumer.
List registered distributors participating in trading activities.
